context: <user> 9 hello , how are you tonight ? are you watching the office <system> hi ! i am well , thanks . i actually just got back from a hike . <user> 10 that sounds wonderful , i live in the city and do not have hiking trails . <system> i am in ohio where there are lots of wooded trails . <user> 11 ohio is lovely , we went hiked blue hen and buttermilk falls once . <system> yes , very nice . my 2 sons love to hike buttermilk falls . <user> 12 that hill though , lol . do you like sweets ? i do not . <system> i try to not eat many sweets to set a good example for my boys .<user> 13 i do not like them that much . do you have any hobbies ? <system> i am single mom so other than hiking , a lot of running my boys around to sports<user> 14 that sounds fun , the boys and hiking part . <system> it is great . what about yourself ?<user> 15 i go to work and take dance lessons . <system>
